timeline.bodyText: Consider having "percent" removed from metric name, and instead represent it as a value between 0 and 1.
timeline.author: bjorncs

replies.bodyText: Also, we should discuss the metric names in an architect meeting at some time.
replies.author: geirst

replies.bodyText: Yes, that’s the intention :) Feel free to reach out early with suggestions.
replies.author: jonmv
